# [Interview #1181: Little City Books-AU Tour, Entry #11](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1181#11)

#### Ted Herman

Does Wit know what became of Helaran?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Depends on where Wit was, so maybe.
